description: This is a dashboard to display air quality in cities worldwide.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT L.latitude AS lat,L.longitude AS lng,AVG(W.AQI) AS avg_AQI
FROM Worldwide W
JOIN 
    Location L ON W.location_id = L.location_id
WHERE L.region = 'Worldwide'
    AND $__timeFilter(W.recorded_at)
GROUP BY L.location_id, L.latitude, L.longitude;

panels.title: Average AQI for PM2.5 by Station

panels.title: Average AQI for PM2.5 by Station

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AQI, recorded_at 
FROM air_quality.Worldwide
WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)

SELECT L.location_city, T.avg_AQI
FROM (
    SELECT location_id, AVG(AQI) AS avg_AQI
    FROM Worldwide
    WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
    GROUP BY location_id
) AS T
JOIN 
    Location AS L ON T.location_id = L.location_id
ORDER BY T.avg_AQI DESC
LIMIT 1;
SELECT recorded_at FROM air_quality.Thailand LIMIT 50

SELECT L.location_city, T.avg_AQI
FROM (
    SELECT location_id, AVG(AQI) AS avg_AQI
    FROM Worldwide
    WHERE $__timeFilter(recorded_at)
    GROUP BY location_id
) AS T
JOIN
    Location AS L ON T.location_id = L.location_id
ORDER BY T.avg_AQI ASC
LIMIT 1;

FROM air_quality.Worldwide
